auth.welcome_description: Please authenticate to access your GitAnimals dashboard

home.title: GitAnimals Webview - Home
home.webview_info_description: This webview includes integrated token management for secure communication with the GitAnimals backend.
features_list: Secure API calls with Bearer token
home.banner_message: WebView with Token Manager is working!

about.title: About GitAnimals
about.description_1: GitAnimals is a gamified platform that allows developers to raise virtual pets through their GitHub activity. The more you contribute to your repositories, the more your virtual animals grow and evolve!
about.description_2: This webview application provides a mobile-friendly interface to interact with your GitAnimals dashboard, view your pets, and track your progress.
features_list: Virtual pet management through GitHub contributions
Real-time synchronization with your GitHub activity
about.authenticated_description: You're already authenticated! Explore your dashboard and manage your virtual pets.
about.not_authenticated_description: To start using GitAnimals, you'll need to authenticate with your GitHub account.
about.banner_message: Start your journey with GitAnimals today!

settings.title: Settings
settings.logout_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to logout? You will need to authenticate again to use the app.
settings.banner_message: Settings page for managing your WebView preferences

notfound.title: Page Not Found
notfound.description: The page you requested does not exist.

quiz.quiz_solve_description: Create a quiz or solve it to earn points!
quiz.create-quiz-card-description: Create an O/X quiz and get [point]P!
quiz.category-description: Choose the category of the quiz.
quiz.quiz-contents-description: Write down the contents of the quiz...
quiz.answer-description: Choose the correct answer for the quiz.

solve-quiz-card-description.not-started: Solve random quiz and get up to [point]P! You can only try once a day.

correct-dialog.title: Correct!
correct-dialog.description: Challenge the next quiz and get double points.

fail-dialog.title: Wrong answer..
fail-dialog.description: You can't get points because the challenge failed.

complete-dialog.title: Champion of the quiz!
complete-dialog.description: Finished the final quiz and got [point]P.
